publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2283 Tricia Marwick: Happy 60th Birthday Glenrothesâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Glenrothes on its 60th birthday; notes that it has become a thriving town which has developed a sense of community and established a settled population, and congratulates the organising committee in Glenrothes for all its efforts to celebrate its town through the very full programme of events that has been arranged. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, John Park*, Alasdair Allan*, Christine Grahame*, Bob Doris*, Jim Hume*, Keith Brown*, Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Elizabeth Smith*
S3M-2283 Happy 60th Birthday Glenrothes (lodged on 27 June 2008) Gil Paterson*, Michael Matheson*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-2283 Happy 60th Birthday Glenrothes (lodged on 27 June 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2283 Happy 60th Birthday Glenrothes (lodged on 27 June 2008) Angela Constance*
